entityTypeId.description: The entity type ID used for the query (if it is available to your user, otherwise <inaccessible>)

status.description: Status of the query (should match folio-query-tool-metadata enum values)

startedAt.description: The timestamp when the query started

endedAt.description: The timestamp when the query ended

numFields.description: Number of fields in the query

totalRecords.description: Number of records retrieved for the query
